# Tests that explicit output-* flags are not affected by --output-exported-default-identifiers=false

muxt generate --output-exported-default-identifiers=false --output-routes-func=MyRoutes

exists template_routes.go

grep 'func MyRoutes' template_routes.go

grep 'type routesReceiver interface' template_routes.go
grep 'type templateRoutePaths' template_routes.go
grep 'type templateData' template_routes.go

exec go test

-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.24
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed template.gohtml
var source embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(source, "template.gohtml"))
-- template.gohtml --
{{define "GET /"}}Hello{{end}}
-- main_test.go --
package main

import (
	"net/http"
	"net/http/httptest"
	"testing"
)

func TestExplicitFlagNotAffected(t *testing.T) {
	mux := http.NewServeMux()
	MyRoutes(mux, nil)

	rec := httptest.NewRecorder()
	req := httptest.NewRequest("GET", "/", nil)
	mux.ServeHTTP(rec, req)

	if rec.Code != http.StatusOK {
		t.Errorf("expected 200, got %d", rec.Code)
	}
}
